projects.title: Lucid Media
projects.description: LUCIDMEDIA was born at a late-night after party at the Palm Springs Film Festival, over diet cokes, a shared love for the craft and science of filmmaking, and an aversion to mediocrity. Founders Gina Leonard and Dan Strickland combined forces, harnessing decades of experience working with blue-chip brands from around the globe.
tasks: Adding custom CSS style to make responsive website
